languages.text: "Влка Фенрика". {n}Гортанный выговор Ульфара звучит архаично и свирепо.{/n} "Так мы зовемся на старом языке нашего мира. Мы — самые яростные из воителей Всеотца, его палачи, его возмездие".

"Vlka Fenryka." {n}This guttural pronouncement sounds primordial and ruthless.{/n} "That is our name in the old tongue of our world. We are the fiercest of the Allfather's warriors, his executioners, his retribution."
languages.original_text: "Влка Фенрика". {n}Гортанный выговор Ульфара звучит архаично и свирепо.{/n} "Так мы зовемся на старом языке нашего мира. Мы — самые яростные из воителей Всеотца, его палачи, его возмездие".

traits.locale_text: "Vlka Fenryka." {n}This guttural pronouncement sounds primordial and ruthless.{/n} "That is our name in Juvykka, the old tongue of our world. We are the fiercest of the Allfather's warriors, his executioners, his retribution. The Rout was another name given to us in the past."

"Vlka Fenryka." {n}This guttural pronouncement sounds primordial and ruthless.{/n} "That is our name in Juvykka, the old tongue of our world. We are the fiercest of the Allfather's warriors, his executioners, his retribution. The Rout was another name given to us in the past."

"Vlka Fenryka." {n}This guttural pronouncement sounds primordial and ruthless.{/n} "That is our name in Juvykka, the old tongue of our world. We are the fiercest of the Allfather's warriors, his executioners, his retribution. The Rout was another name given to us in the past."

"Vlka Fenryka." {n}This guttural pronouncement sounds primordial and ruthless.{/n} "That is our name in the old tongue of our world. We are the fiercest of the Allfather's warriors, his executioners, his retribution."

languages.text: «Vlka Fenryka». {n}Las palabras, guturales suenan primordiales y despiadadas.{/n} «Así nos llaman en la antigua lengua de nuestro mundo. Somos los más feroces guerreros del Padre de todas las cosas. Sus verdugos y su venganza».
languages.original_text: "Vlka Fenryka." {n}This guttural pronouncement sounds primordial and ruthless.{/n} "That is our name in the old tongue of our world. We are the fiercest of the Allfather's warriors, his executioners, his retribution."

traits.locale_text: «Vlka Fenryka». {n}Las palabras, guturales suenan primordiales y despiadadas.{/n} «Así nos llaman en la antigua lengua de nuestro mundo. Somos los más feroces guerreros del Padre de todas las cosas. Sus verdugos y su venganza».

languages.text: “芬里斯之狼。”{n}他铿锵有力的声音听起来原始而无情。{/n}“这是我们世界古老语言中的名字。我们是全父最凶猛的战士，是他的刽子手，为他所有的敌人带来报应。”
languages.original_text: "Vlka Fenryka." {n}This guttural pronouncement sounds primordial and ruthless.{/n} "That is our name in the old tongue of our world. We are the fiercest of the Allfather's warriors, his executioners, his retribution."

traits.locale_text: “芬里斯之狼。”{n}他铿锵有力的声音听起来原始而无情。{/n}“这是我们世界古老语言中的名字。我们是全父最凶猛的战士，是他的刽子手，为他所有的敌人带来报应。”

languages.text: 「ヴルカ・フェンリカ」{n}この喉から吐き出るような言葉は、本能的で冷酷に響く。{/n}「それが俺たちの世界の古い言葉でいう俺たちの名前だ。俺たちは全知の父の戦士、死刑執行人、報復者の中で最も勇敢な者たちだ」
languages.original_text: "Vlka Fenryka." {n}This guttural pronouncement sounds primordial and ruthless.{/n} "That is our name in the old tongue of our world. We are the fiercest of the Allfather's warriors, his executioners, his retribution."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴルカ・フェンリカ」{n}この喉から吐き出るような言葉は、本能的で冷酷に響く。{/n}「それが俺たちの世界の古い言葉でいう俺たちの名前だ。俺たちは全知の父の戦士、死刑執行人、報復者の中で最も勇敢な者たちだ」

languages.text: « Vlka Fenryka. » {n}Cette formule gutturale qui semble ressurgie du fond des âges revêt une sonorité implacable.{/n} « Tel est notre nom dans la langue ancestrale de notre monde. Nous sommes les plus farouches guerriers du Père de Tous, ses bourreaux, son bras vengeur. »
languages.original_text: "Vlka Fenryka." {n}This guttural pronouncement sounds primordial and ruthless.{/n} "That is our name in the old tongue of our world. We are the fiercest of the Allfather's warriors, his executioners, his retribution."

traits.locale_text: « Vlka Fenryka. » {n}Cette formule gutturale qui semble ressurgie du fond des âges revêt une sonorité implacable.{/n} « Tel est notre nom dans la langue ancestrale de notre monde. Nous sommes les plus farouches guerriers du Père de Tous, ses bourreaux, son bras vengeur. »

languages.text: "Vlka Fenryka." {n}Diese kehlige Verkündigung klingt urzeitlich und gnadenlos.{/n} "Das ist unser Name in der alten Sprache unserer Welt. Wir sind die wildesten Krieger des Allvaters, seine Henker, seine Vergeltung."
languages.original_text: "Vlka Fenryka." {n}This guttural pronouncement sounds primordial and ruthless.{/n} "That is our name in the old tongue of our world. We are the fiercest of the Allfather's warriors, his executioners, his retribution."

traits.locale_text: "Vlka Fenryka." {n}Diese kehlige Verkündigung klingt urzeitlich und gnadenlos.{/n} "Das ist unser Name in der alten Sprache unserer Welt. Wir sind die wildesten Krieger des Allvaters, seine Henker, seine Vergeltung."

languages.original_text: "Vlka Fenryka." {n}This guttural pronouncement sounds primordial and ruthless.{/n} "That is our name in the old tongue of our world. We are the fiercest of the Allfather's warriors, his executioners, his retribution."

languages.text: "Vlka Fenryka." {n}Gırtlaktan çıkardığı bu söz, kulağa ilkel ve acımasız geliyor.{/n} "Yani dünyamızın eski dilinde bizim adımız. Biz Yücebaba'nın en acımasız savaşçıları, onun cellatları ve intikamıyız."
languages.original_text: "Vlka Fenryka." {n}This guttural pronouncement sounds primordial and ruthless.{/n} "That is our name in the old tongue of our world. We are the fiercest of the Allfather's warriors, his executioners, his retribution."

traits.locale_text: "Vlka Fenryka." {n}Bu gırtlaktan söz, kulağa ilkel ve acımasız geliyor.{/n} "Yani dünyamızın eski dilinde bizim adımız. Biz Yücebaba'nın en acımasız savaşçıları, onun cellatları ve intikamıyız."
